channel.title: No update upon death?
channel.description:
I'm testing my pk area by using 2 computers and logging into a char on each.
When player A kills player B, player B does the death emote. Then on players B's screen he is teleported back to home like normal. But player A still views player B sitting right where player B died. When player B moves, he moves from where he died on player A's screen.
If you can follow that description I'd appreciated a little help here.
EDIT: I have temporarily "fixed" this by applying a kick to the defeated player so they are refreshed, need a permanent fix..

item.title: No update upon death?
item.dc:creator: @Keepaforlife Keepaforlife
item.description:
@Keepaforlife wrote:

I’m testing my pk area by using 2 computers and logging into a char on each.

When player A kills player B, player B does the death emote. Then on players B’s screen he is teleported back to home like normal. But player A still views player B sitting right where player B died. When player B moves, he moves from where he died on player A’s screen.

If you can follow that description I’d appreciated a little help here.

EDIT: I have temporarily “fixed” this by applying a kick to the defeated player so they are refreshed, need a permanent fix…

Read full topic
